title: Not getting any IP after winning or losing
body:
i m not getting any IP points (which r now blue essence) after winning or losing any matchmade game ..
Anyone knows why ??

replies.body: The system was changed a bit to reward XP after a game instead of IP/BE.  You'll still be able to get BE through leveling, mastery, and honor.  Our devs into more details[ in this thread ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/pt/c/developer-corner/Jh3Mtzu6-blue-essence-earn-rates-learning-the-numbers-with-carl-and-henrietta)if you'd like to share any feedback on this.
